modName: Enabler Mod for Easy Custom Paint and Terrain Textures
modShortDescription: A mod that enables other mods to "easily" add custom block paint and/or terrain textures.
modDescription:
ocbMaurice would like to introduce a mod he has created last week that might be interesting to other modders. A mod that enables other mods to “easily” add custom block paint and/or terrain [textures](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-textures/). It reduces the needed work to a proper unity3d resource file and the accompanying xml.

Haven’t tested it that thoroughly yet, so there might be a few bugs left. On the other hand it already supports automatic scaling for half/quad texture sizes.

**[Download](https://github.com/OCB7D2D/OcbCustomTextures/archive/refs/tags/0.1.0.zip)** Custom Textures  
**[Download](https://github.com/OCB7D2D/OcbCustomTexturesDemo/archive/refs/tags/0.1.0.zip)** Custom Textures Demo

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/28269-enabler-mod-for-easy-custom-paint-and-terrain-textures/).

**Credits:** [ocbMaurice](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/ocbmaurice/)
